title: Pixel 3 android auto missing option for new version on car display
content:
Updated pixel 3 to android 10. Installed newest android auto app. When I connect this to my car, I get the "old version" on the display in the car.

On my old phone with android 9 there was an option in the menu in the android auto app to try the new look on the car display (modern look, new notification center, etc).

With me pixel, I am missing that option, even though I tried the same or newer  version of android auto. 

How can I get the new look?
